Posts.Content: asimplegirl20 wrote: Hi! I'm 19 years old and I recently found a lump. You cannot see it but you can feel it. I believe it feels smooth, I have no pain, no physical "warning" signs such as inverting or discharge, but I had an ultrasound done a few days ago and the doctor started out saying it was "nothing to worry about" then got the results back and said it was "abnormal" and is referring me to a breast center for further consultations. I am very scared. Does anyone have any advice? Thank you so much. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: 19 years old, found a lump, being referred to a breast center asimplegirl20 Rachel888
